name: Pietzo
overview:
Pietzo is the hybrid electric bicycle company offering a complete commuting program that expands the number of riders using fun, eco-friendly transportation, and uniquely supports the needs of campus and corporate fleets. Our mission is to get people out of the driving habit by supporting employers, universities, government organizations and other groups with an eco-friendly and effective electric bicycle transportation program.

What sets Pietzo apart is our commitment to providing employers with a complete support program for their corporate fleets. We believe that by adopting a certified electric bicycle program, employers can demonstrate their commitment to providing a cleaner, less congested transportation ecosystem. Our customers include corporations, universities, hotels, resorts, and active adult communities. They all share the same commitment to reducing greenhouse gases and promoting alternative transportation solutions for the benefit of their employees and communities. Pietzo offers a turn-key program that makes it easy to build and support a fleet. We include fully assembled bicycles with locks, helmets, and free on-site maintenance for fleet purchases for up to one full year.
